author: Olaoluwa Afolabi
title: Harnessing Concurrent Execution with “Future.wait()” in Dart | HackerNoon
description: In Dart, there exists a powerful utility known as `Future.wait()`. This often-overlooked gem enables developers to orchestrate concurrent execution of multiple asynchronous tasks. In this blog, we will explore the problem domain where 'Future.Wait()` can save the day and delve into best practices.
